entry.title: Crumbling Train Bridges Are Everywhere. Railroads and Cities Are Sparring Over When to Fix Them.
entry.content: An independent inspection and letters from lawmakers helped Binghamton, N.Y., push Norfolk Southern to upgrade infrastructure.

entry.title: Israel-Hamas War Sparks Wave of Antisemitism in Europe
entry.content: European Jews have taken a double blow: The shock from Hamas’s attack on Israel and a rise in antisemitic incidents since.

entry.title: Israeli Forces Make Major Advance Toward Gaza City
entry.content: Israeli tanks and infantry pushed into the outskirts of Gaza City and blocked one of the main roads connecting the northern part of the strip to the south, witnesses said.
